About Seascape Sport Horses


Founded in 2016, Seascape Sport Horses is located at the beautiful Bonny Doon Equestrian Center. Founded by Charis Dankert, SSH specializes in importing high end European sport horses to compete in hunter, jumpers, and equitation.
